select student_course.*,students.name as studentName from student_course left join students on student_course.student_id = students.id
and student_course.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and student_course.no like concat('%',#{no},'%')
and student_course.student_id=#{student_id}
and student_course.del_state=1
order by id desc
